user.title: Pay tribute to your departed loved one
user.text: This private space gathers {{{namize firstname}}}'s close ones and allows you to share a message, a memory or a photo.

user.title: Invite {{{namize firstname}}}'s close ones
user.text: Share this space with everyone who wishes to gather and pay tribute to {{{namize firstname}}}.

manager.title: Discover an intimate space of tribute and sharing
manager.text: Pay tribute to {{{namize firstname}}} in this private and secure space. You are in control and decide who can access it.

manager.title: Easily communicate logistic details
manager.text: Communicate the funeral information to your loved ones by sharing this space with one click.

manager.title: Give your loved ones a dedicated commemoration space
manager.text: Your loved ones can share a message or photo and have flowers delivered to the funeral site.

steps.label: Order a book
steps.title: New inmemori book
steps.subtitle: A new elegant layout highlighting the different tributes and photos shared on this space.

oversize.subtitle: Here is your selection. Benefit from reduced prices by ordering several copies.

support.subject: Book order
support.text:
Hello,
I wish to order (a) book(s) and would like to receive a quote. Can help with this please?
Thanks.

steps.subtitle: Here is your selection. You can change the quantity if you wish.

labels.beneficiary: Who is the beneficiary of the funds?

notes.message: This message is visible to your loved ones and allows you to say more about the cause supported.
notes.iban: The account into which the funds will be paid to you
notes.documents: Please add your identity documents. (Driver license or passport. Front and back.)
notes.close: The funds collected are transferred automatically to your bank account once a week, on Mondays, as long as the collection is not closed.
notes.closed: The total amount of the collection ({{stats.donations.total_f}}) will be transferred to the bank account {{donation.iban}} within 48 hours.

warning.documents: Make sure to match the address given above with the address on your ID, or you may have to provide another proof of address.
warning.files: Only images in .PNG or .JPEG / .JPG format of size less than 5MB are accepted.
warning.close: Please send your proof of identity to be able to close this collection of donations.

family: For those who wish to participate, we organized a collection of donations in memory of {{{namize firstname}}}.
org:
We know that the association {{{org}}} was very important to {{{namize firstname}}}. It is important to us to support their mission by setting up a fundraiser.

Many thanks for your participation.

profile-setup.title: Veuillez renseigner votre email afin d'accéder à l'espace en hommage à {{{fullname}}}
profile-setup.subtitle: Il a été créé pour vous par votre conseiller de l'agence {{agency.name}}.

edit-intro.title: Edit the welcome text
edit-intro.subtitle: The family and close ones are saddened to share the news of the passing of {{fullname}} which occurred on {{lowercase dod}}.
templates:
Dear family, dear friends,
We are very sad to announce the passing of {{{namize firstname}}} {{# if dod}} which occurred last {{dod}} {{/ if}} {{# if age}} at the age of {{age}} years. {{/ if}} 

This inmemori page is intended to collect your testimonials: a message, a memory, an anecdote or a photo, illustrating a moment of life.

The information about the funeral is shown below. Thank you for your support.

Dear family, dear friends,
We are very sad to announce the death of {{{namize firstname}}} {{# if dod}} which occurred last {{dod}} {{/ if}} {{# if age}} at the age of {{age}} years. {{/ if}} 

This inmemori page is intended to collect your testimonials: a message, a memory or a photo, illustrating a moment you shared with {{{namize firstname}}}.

The information about the funeral is shown below. Thank you for your support.

card-ft-flower.text: Send flowers to the funeral place

tab-share.title: Share the space

steps.title: Share the space
steps.subtitle: Help the family inform everyone who knew {{{namize firstname}}}

steps.title: Email
steps.subtitle: Share the announcement with everyone close to the deceased. They will have access to the space of {{{namize firstname}}}.

tab-share.message: Hello, with great sadness, we announce the loss of {{{fullname}}}. This inmemori space is intended to pay tribute to {{{namize firstname}}}. Simply enter your email to access the space and share the link with those who knew {{{namize firstname}}}
tab-share.email:
Hello, 

It is with great sadness that we announce the passing of {{{fullname}}}.

We share with you this private inmemori space on the internet to pay tribute to {{{namize firstname}}}. By going to space you can : 

- See the funeral information
- Share a condolence message, a memory and/or a photo

We appreciate your messages of support in these difficult times.

In order to include everyone who knew {{{namize firstname}}}, please share this space with them.

Kindly,

tab-infos.promo: The funeral is being organized by {{{name}}}.{{#if phone}} {{phone}}{{/if}}

managers-add.title: Add more administrators
managers-add.subtitle: Enter the email address of the people you want to invite as manager(s).
managers-add.message:
Hello,

I added you as administrator of the inmemori space in tribute to {{{namize firstname}}} so that you can help me personalize and manage it. 

The inmemori team is at our disposal for any questions and can be reached at (415) 532 3923 or by email at contact@inmemori.com.
managers-add.snackbar:
Hello,

I added you as administrator of the inmemori space in tribute to {{{namize firstname}}} so that you can help me personalize and manage it. 

The inmemori team is at our disposal for any questions and can be reached at (415) 532 3923 or by email at contact@inmemori.com.

managers-list.title: Managers
managers-list.subtitle: The administrators are the managers of this space. Click on "Add an administrator" to invite someone by email.
